description: What happens when next-level insulation gets a healthy dose of stylish inspiration? Give the Tri Thermal Threads Overshirt for men, and you’ll quickly find out. Start with Polartec® Thermal Pro® fabric, an advanced fleece technology that delivers a hefty dose of warmth, without the weight. Out the outer shell, a densely knitted yarn creates a classic vibe. While inside, soft lining adds an extra layer of coziness. But of course, we couldn’t have all these next-level warmth without the design details to back it up. That’s why you’ll find stylsh yet convenient metal snaps along the front and a velour fleece back.
name: Prana Tri Thermal Threads Overshirt - Mens
